MediaRecorderWarning_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The warning event fires on non-fatal errors during media recording via a MediaRecorder. Non-fatal errors are one's that don't halt recording.

remarks.para:
-Using the MediaStream Recording API
-Web Dictaphone: MediaRecorder + getUserMedia + Web Audio API visualization demo, by Chris Mills (source on GitHub.)
-simpl.info MediaStream Recording demo, by Sam Dutton.
-
